title: The Psychology of Money: Timeless Lessons on Wealth, Greed, and Happiness
author: Morgan Housel
description: In 'The Psychology of Money', Morgan Housel shares insightful lessons on the complexities of money and the behaviours that drive financial decisions. The book combines historical anecdotes, personal stories, and research to explore how emotions and psychology influence our relationship with wealth, enabling readers to make better financial choices and attain true happiness through responsible financial management.
